activities: If the user opts in for the SourceForge.net newsletter, the user will receive the SourceForge.net newsletter by email.  Otherwise, we do not use user's personal information.  Additionally, information received from the following sites are also included in this certification:  SourceForge.com, SourceForge.net, Slashdot.org, freshmeat.net, ITmanagersJournal.com, and Linux.com
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
